project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Fourth Basic Education Project are: (1) to increase access/equity for the absolute poor in primary and junior secondary education, paying particular attention to girls and minority nationalities; (2) to enhance quality in primary and junior secondary schooling, and the corresponding teacher education and training of trainers' programs; and and (3) to improve efficiency in education delivery through improving educational management at national, provincial, county, and project institutional levels. The project components are: (1) to provide civil works construction, equipment, furniture, books and other instructional materials to primary and junior secondary schools in poor, minority, and remote areas; (2) to upgrade the professional content and practical skills of teachers and principals; and (3) to train education managers, and develop and utilize educational management information services.

P036952.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第四基础教育项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）提高绝对贫困家庭子女小学和初中入学率，增强小学和初中教育公平性，重点是女童和少数民族儿童；（2）提高小学和初中教学质量及与之相关的师资教育培训项目质量；（3）通过改进中央、省县级和项目机构教育管理提高教育服务提供效率。本项目的具体内容如下：（1）为贫困地区、民族地区和偏远地区小学和初中建设土建工程，提供设备、桌椅板凳、书本和其它教学资料；（2）增强教师和校长职业精神和实用技能；（3）培养教育管理人员，发展并使用教育管理信息服务。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
